Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays at Howard due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delays at Howard due to fire department activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problems at King Drive. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problems at King Drive.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/24th Place
ShortDescription: EB 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
